template.title: Create a Blazor WebAssembly project with an ASP.NET Core Web API middle-tier (.NET 5)
template.description: Blazor is a .NET web framework that allows C# code to run cross-platform in the browser. The template installs a Blazor WebAssembly client project and an ASP.NET Core server project. At runtime a browser automatically downloads the client from the webserver and runs it locally. The server's role is both Web server and Web API middle-tier for data access. The server connects to a SQLite database for which sample recordsets have been generated.
